name: Shy Guy Surfing (Demo)
description:
Are you a bad enough dude to surf across the world?

Slide, jump, and float over the ocean in Shy Guy Surfing, a Super Mario fangame demo. Lead your surfer through procedurally-generated obstacles in familiar worlds and aim for a high score!

Classic music from the Mario series and beyond is included, remixed in crisp 8-bit by Branflakes, Bulby, and VinylCheese.

This demo includes the first three major areas of Shy Guy Surfing, playable exclusively in the game's Endurance Mode. Journey Mode is unavailable, as is the tutorial and Records Menu.

CONTROLS:

  • Use WASD or the Arrow Keys to move.
  • Press SPACE or Z to Jump and Float.
  • Press SHIFT or X to use Shield Attacks.
  • Press ESCAPE to pause the game.
